Title: Establishes the Charles L. Reason fellowship
Summary: Establishes the Charles L. Reason fellowship for the purpose of increasing faculty diversity in higher education.
LawCode: Ren Title 7 Art 130 to be Art 129-C, add ยง6457, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to establishing the Charles L. Reason fellowship for the purpose of increasing faculty diversity in higher education in New York
